Feature boxes

Feature boxes

Feature boxes highlight certain information in the context of a page.

On this page
  • Visual design
  • Approved Icons
  • Guidelines for use
  • Layouts
  • Examples and assets

Visual design

Tips feature box

Design view:

Mobile design

Desktop designs can be viewed on screens wider than 650px.

Layout on full width pages

Tips box - full width pages

The text in this component can be paragraphs.

  • Or list points which are also handy.
  • It just needs to be formatted in the same was as general body text on the site.

Layout on 2/3 width pages

Tips box - 2/3 width pages

The text in this component can be paragraphs.

  • Or list points which are also handy.
  • It just needs to be formatted in the same was as general body text on the site.
  • HTML
  • CSS

Examples feature box

Design view:

Mobile design

Desktop designs can be viewed on screens wider than 650px.

Layout on full width pages

Example or cases study title

The text in this component can be paragraphs.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Aliquam facilisisultricies arcu non pretium. Nullam nec faucibus ligula, nec venenatis ligula. Donec justo neque, euismod eu ligula id, pellentesque euismod mi.

Layout on 2/3 width pages

The text in this component can be paragraphs.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Aliquam facilisisultricies arcu non pretium. Nullam nec faucibus ligula, nec venenatis ligula. Donec justo neque, euismod eu ligula id, pellentesque euismod mi.

Approved icons

Tips

Example

Latest news

Guidelines for use

Purpose: 

Feature boxes highlight certain information in the context of a page.

When to use this component: 

Used to highlight examples or latest news that may be of interest to the user. Typical uses can include:

  • Latest news
  • Examples and case studies
  • Tips

Layouts

Page layouts

Feature box components can be used in full width and 2/3rd width pages.

Component layout options

Full width layout

Desktop, Tablet & Mobile: One component in a row.

Examples and assets

View feature box design and assets in Adobe XD.
